meanings.definition: A person or thing that economizes.
meanings.sent1: My mom is a great economizers, always finding ways to save money.
meanings.sent2: The squirrel is a natural economizers, storing nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent3: The economizers at the party made sure to take home leftover food.
meanings.sent4: She was like an economizers of time, always planning her day efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The little ant in the story was portrayed as a wise economizers.

meanings.definition: A device or system that reduces energy consumption.
meanings.sent1: The new air conditioner has an economizers feature to save electricity.
meanings.sent2: Solar panels are great economizers of energy, helping to lower bills.
meanings.sent3: The smart home's economizers kicked in to lower the power usage.
meanings.sent4: The windmill was like a giant economizers, harnessing natural energy.
meanings.sent5: The city installed economizers in all streetlights to be more eco-friendly.
